title: This absolutely sucks!
body:
Once again I'm not allowed to queue for ranked because I dodged a game when I never dodged in the first place. 

Another player in the game didn't pick their champion as the timer went down to zero. I sat in champ select wondering for a good few minutes what do I do next. The other players started exiting the lobby.

Since it has happened to me before and I knew if I closed it I would be put on the dodge timer, so I waited a couple more minutes and I was taken back to the screen where you select your roles before queuing up for ranked. And what happens?, it tells me I'm on a DODGE TIMER.

I DIDN'T EVEN DODGE. WHY AM I PUT ON A DODGE TIMER I DON'T UNDERSTAND?!

I know it's just 5 minutes but this is the third time it has happened and none of those times it was my fault but someone else not picking their champ in time.

I don't know if this is bug or something else, but please fix it.

Edit; Just happened for the fourth time!!!!!!!! And now the dodge timer is 25 minutes. I have no idea why am I being punished when I didn't do ANYTHING!

replies.body:
If someone leaves the match lobby while you're picking champions, you won't ever actually see them leave the lobby. Once a single person leaves, the lobby will be closed and you will be placed back into the queue. If you were actually able to see each single person leave one at a time, we'll need some kind of video to be able to see exactly what was happening, because that's definitely not supposed to happen. 

If you're actually seeing people leave in the *chatbox* that really tips me off that something is giving your network some difficulty in staying connected with the game lobby. In that case, I'd suggest making sure you go through all the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as you probably just need to adjust some of your network settings.

>
> If someone leaves the match lobby while you're picking champions, you won't ever actually see them leave the lobby. Once a single person leaves, the lobby will be closed and you will be placed back into the queue. If you were actually able to see each single person leave one at a time, we'll need some kind of video to be able to see exactly what was happening, because that's definitely not supposed to happen. 
> 
> **If you're actually seeing people leave in the *chatbox* that really tips me off that something is giving your network some difficulty in staying connected with the game lobby.** In that case, I'd suggest making sure you go through all the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as you probably just need to adjust some of your network settings.

Yeah, that is what happens. I'm sorry for wording it incorrectly.
